about_the_game:
Firebird: Legend of the Crystal Goddesses is a love letter to classic RPGs of the SNES era, inspired by 16-bit Final Fantasy and Dragon Quest titles, with an EarthBound-style mix of meta-humor thrown in.

The game follows a mercenary named Dameon Phoenix, a seemingly-ordinary swordsman with a secret past, as he takes on contracts for the local citizens in the Kingdom of Regatul. Along the way, he and his friends are set on a path to inadvertently unleash a devastating source of power, and wrestle with the aftermath while helping a powerful mage named Hanako undo what has been done.

Set in the colorful and magical world of Diyosia, Firebird: Legend of the Crystal Goddesses will take players across many different kingdoms and continents, sailing upon the seas, soaring up to the clouds above, and beyond the very mortal realm itself.

A classic fantasy adventure is yours to experience. Are you up to the task of saving Diyosia from being plunged into eternal darkness?

content_descriptors.notes:
Firebird: Legend of the Crystal Goddesses contains alcohol use including jobs being taken from bars and taverns, and a character in the party that favors alcoholic beverages.

The game also includes instances of mild profanity, which may not be suitable for younger players.
